shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=count = if(below(count,9),count+1,0);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=q1 = 0.5;
per_frame_4=q2 = 0.5;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=zoom = 1 + 0.065*bass_att+0.05*bass;
per_frame_8=monitor=q3;
per_frame_9=q30=bass+mid+treb;
per_frame_10=q3 = q30*1.4;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 pixelsize = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`float2 uvm = uv_orig;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, frac(noise_uv*8));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`ret.xyz = saturate(tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uvm).xyz*float3(1,1,.97) - float3(.0,.0,.001));
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`float3 rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.xy-.5)*6*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_13=`if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_14=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_15=`
warp_16=`//rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.zw-.5)*2*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_17=`//if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_18=`//ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_19=`
warp_20=`
warp_21=`ret.xy *= pow(ret.z,.01);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_rose;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).z,
comp_6=`
comp_7=`ret = lerp (
comp_8=`GetBlur1(uv).z + GetBlur3(uv).z,
comp_9=`ret,
comp_10=`pow(ret,1));
comp_11=`ret-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_12=`  
comp_13=`float1 val = ret*6.2831853;
comp_14=`    ret = pow(ret,float3(8,2,.8))*1.25 - .25;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    ret *= 1.0; //gamma
comp_17=`
comp_18=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv),
comp_19=`
comp_20=`}
